What to Know About the Vuselela TVET College Application Form Portal

The Vuselela TVET College VTC Application portal is designed to accept application of candidates seeking for admission into the University. In the portal, applicant can Purchase application form, Track and monitor application status, pay fees, Print Acknowledgement Slip, check admission list, etc.

Who is Eligible to Apply for Admission

To be eligible for admission in the VTC application portal, candidates must;

  • Have Secondary School Leaving Certificate
  • Meet National Senior Certificate (NSC) requirement for admission into Higher Certificate
  • Grade 12 certificate applicant is of added advantage
  • Must write the NBTs for admission to VTC on/before 15 October 2024.
  • FPS of 480 or above.
  • NBT scores of Upper
  • Intermediate for AL & QL
  • Mathematics 60%
  • English HL 50%
  • English FAL 60%

Vuselela TVET College Application Requirements

Vuselela TVET College is a South African Technical and Vocational Education and Training (TVET) college that offers a variety of courses and programs to help students develop their skills and knowledge in different fields.

The admission requirements for Vuselela TVET College vary depending on the specific course or program that you want to apply for. However, in general, the following are the minimum admission requirements for all programs:

  1. National Senior Certificate (NSC) or Senior Certificate (SC) with endorsement
  2. A minimum of 40% in the language of teaching and learning
  3. A minimum of 30% in Mathematics or Mathematics Literacy (for engineering and business studies)
  4. A minimum of 30% in Physical Science (for engineering studies)
  5. A minimum of 40% in Accounting (for financial management studies)
  6. A minimum of 50% in Life Orientation.

How to Apply | VTC Application Form 2024

To apply online to Vuselela TVET College, follow these steps:
  1. Visit the Vuselela TVET College website at www.vuselelacollege.co.za.
  2. Click on the “Applications” tab on the top menu and select “Online Applications.”
  3. Read the instructions and click on the “Apply Online” button.
  4. Complete the online application form with accurate information.
  5. Upload any required supporting documents, such as certified copies of your ID and academic records.
  6. Submit the completed online application form and wait for a confirmation of submission.

 

Vuselela TVET College Application Required Documents

To apply to VTC you need to submit the following documentation:

  • A completed application form
  • A copy of your results for the latest school year
  • A copy of your ID
  • If you have attended another higher education institution, we need a copy of your academic transcript
